author: mrglavas
msg: JIRA Issue #XERCESJ-1452: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-1452. Produce more helpful error messages when minOccurs/maxOccurs constraints are violated. We're able to do this in cases where we are using a counting DFA.
